barker_notes.barker_summary: A. Carnahan to Austin, July 6, 1826. Account and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1369

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*A. Carnahan to Austin, July 6, 1826. Account and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-06-1826">July 6th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colonel Austin*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*A. Carnahan Dr.*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*to 2 thimbles for shot gun at 50-----------------------------------------------------$1. 00*/p* *p*to wiper claw for rifle------------------------------------------------------------------- .50*/p* *p*to Bushing double barrel gun--------------------------------------------------------- 1. 50*/p* *p*to mending britch------------------------------------------------------------------------- . 50*/p* *p*to pointing dogs---------------------------------------------------------------------------- . 75*/p* *p*$4.25*/p* *p*Received payment in full*/p*
______ *p* *person_mentioned*A. Carnahan*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
